attributes.title: Sandwich
attributes.review: This is the biggest spam! DO NOT GET ❌❌❌❌❌ it’s a total waste. If your going to make a app try to make it work like Jeez. It won’t even let me open it. And I got into it once and all it had was a blank screen. Again Do NOT GET ❌❌❌

attributes.title: How bad this app is
attributes.review:
I’m not part of gen z or anything but this app is rlly bad I tried to get it to see what trump was going to do and stuff about the election the way this app is set up is rlly bad I don’t recommend this app if u see it plz don’t 

Hhhhbbbnnnnnnnnmnnnnnnnm

attributes.title: Worst app I’ve ever gotten !
attributes.review:
Hi my names Karen and I downloaded this app bc I adore our heavenly president Donald Trump! HOWEVER, this app is complete garbage I tried to get notifications and received HATE MAIL instead! (I know it’s absurd but 100% true) I’m so upset that this app wasn’t up to my standards. 

-Karen L.

attributes.title: awful. don’t download , it’s a scam
attributes.review:
this app is literally horrible,
don’t download. it took almost an entire WEEK to download. it tried scamming me and ever since i downloaded its made my phone glitch. it won’t even open. DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: ✨😌👩🏻‍🦽stop it , get some help 👩🏻‍🦽😌✨
attributes.review: WORST app EVER!!!!! i opened the app and it immediately shut down my phone and restart it. i was so upset so i came straight to the app store to a write a HORRIBLE review. i am very disappointed. how can a multi billionaire make such a poor app?

attributes.title: Important
attributes.review: This app is one of the best, sorry autocorrect worst apps on the apple store. I could honestly hand a bunch of 5th graders some computers and create a better app. I feel bad for POTUS bank account because the developers scammed him tbh. I heard the biden2020 app is better

attributes.title: 🤮 This app made me hate this country
attributes.review: Literally who put him in this role. We need him and his wifey to go. He DOES NOT belong in such a place. It’s a disgrace that he cannot understand simple things and he lets racism and bigotry flourish in this country. Cancel him as well as this app. ❤️

attributes.title: Absolutely a Spam App
attributes.review: Downloaded it and instantly made my phone freeze. China has now hacked all of my personal information and stolen all of my credit card info. Would rate a 0 if I could. This is 100% a spam app, DO NOT DOWNLOAD.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: Okay so i got this app because i thought daddy trump🤤 made an only fans account and it was made into an app. But i was severely disappointed when i found out it’s just an app. Not an only fans app of our daddy donald orange trump😍🙈. Do not get this app😔🤚

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: Thought this app would give useful information but it’s been crashing and has nothing that i can’t already find on the internet.
